scene_description: The camera zooms in tightly on a young snowboarder’s face, cheeks rosy from the cold and eyes sparkling with excitement. Tiny snowflakes cling to their eyelashes, and a frosty mist rises gently from their breath. The background is softly blurred, hinting at a sparkling white slope and a few distant snow-covered pine trees. The bright winter sunlight glints off the snow, making the scene feel crisp, chilly, and full of energy.
items: A child wearing a colorful winter jacket and a knitted hat, their face flushed from exertion, with goggles pushed up on their forehead.
Snowflakes resting on the child’s eyelashes and hat, catching the sunlight.
Frosty breath curling in the cold air, visible in front of the child’s mouth.
The tip of a snowboard visible at the bottom corner of the frame, angled slightly as if ready for a descent.
